item.title: DarsUp
item.description: DarsUp is a new generation of universities. In todayâ€™s busy world you cannot always adjust your schedule to pursue a full time education. Online learning enables you to study for an internationally recognised qualification without making your life hard. Whether you are a graduated person wanting to start your career without sacrificing your education or a busy professional looking for the next career step, online study is the best solution for you.

item.title: My Resume
item.description: About Me I am Mahdiar Jalalian, a Frontend Developer with 2 years of experience in building and optimizing large-scale web applications. My expertise lies in developing modern, high-performance user interfaces using the latest frontend technologies. Expertise Frontend Technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Vue.js, Vite, Nx monorepos State Management & Form Handling: Redux, React Query, Zustand, React Hook Form, Yup, Zod UI & Styling: MUI, Ant Design, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS Additional Tools: Context API, JWT, Socket.
